heading: Shivta Ruins Dungeon Guide
content: Shivta Ruins is a good dungeon featuring the highly valuable . The layout is circular, however, which leads to lots of backtracking and slowing down clear times. Overall, it's just OK for running Nightmare Dungeons, but you should almost always run this at least once for the Codex of Power reward. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
